# <a name="_toc197857245"></a>**Appendix**
**A.1 Key Database Schema**

The database schema for LingoFlows consists of several interconnected tables that support the system’s functionality. The core tables include:

Table 1.1 Users Table — Stores user information and role assignments

|user\_id|Primary key, auto-incrementing integer|
| :- | :- |
|username|Unique identifier for login|
|password\_hash|Securely stored password hash|
|email|User’s email address|
|role|User’s role (Business Owner, Project Manager, Financial Team)|
|create\_time|Timestamp of account creation|
|last\_login|Timestamp of most recent login|



Table 1.2 Projects Table — Central repository for project information

|project\_id|Primary key, auto-incrementing integer|
| :- | :- |
|project\_name|Project name|
|request\_id|Foreign key referencing the Requests table|
|pm\_id|Foreign key referencing the user who manages the project|
|status|Current project status (e.g., Pending, In Progress, Completed)|
|create\_time|Project creation timestamp|
|expected\_delivery\_date|Anticipated completion date|
|actual\_delivery\_date|Actual completion date (if applicable)|



Table 1.3 Requests Table — Stores initial localization requests

|request\_id|Primary key, auto-incrementing integer|
| :- | :- |
|request\_name|Descriptive name for the request|
|requester\_id|Foreign key referencing the requesting user|
|request\_background|Context and purpose information|
|source\_language|Original content language|
|create\_time|Request submission timestamp|
|status|Current request status|



Table 1.4 Project\_Languages Table — Links projects to their target languages

|project\_language\_id|Primary key, auto-incrementing integer|
| :- | :- |
|project\_id|Foreign key referencing Projects table|
|language\_code|ISO language code|
|language\_name|Human-readable language name|



Table 1.5 Task\_Assignments Table — Tracks task assignments within projects

|assignment\_id|Primary key, auto-incrementing integer|
| :- | :- |
|project\_id|Foreign key referencing Projects table|
|task\_type|Type of task (Translation, LQA, Translation Update, LQA Report Finalization)|
|language\_code|ISO language code for the specific assignment|
|assignee\_id|Foreign key referencing Users table (the assigned LSP)|
|deadline|Task completion deadline|
|status|Current task status|
|notes|Additional instructions or context|



Table 1.6 Files Table — Manages file uploads and deliverables

|file\_id|Primary key, auto-incrementing integer|
| :- | :- |
|project\_id|Foreign key referencing Projects table|
|file\_name|Original file name|
|file\_path|Server path to stored file|
|file\_type|MIME type or category|
|upload\_time|Timestamp of upload|
|uploader\_id|Foreign key referencing Users table|
|file\_group|Categorization of related files|
|language\_code|ISO language code|
|version|Version number for tracking changes|



Table 1.7 Task\_Quotes Table — Stores financial quotes for tasks

|quote\_id|Primary key, auto-incrementing integer|
| :- | :- |
|project\_id|Foreign key referencing Projects table|
|task\_type|Type of task|
|language\_code|ISO language code|
|assignee\_id|Foreign key referencing Users table|
|amount|Quoted price|
|currency|Currency code (e.g., USD, EUR)|
|word\_count|Number of words|
|unit\_price|Price per word|
|submission\_date|Quote submission timestamp|
|status|Approval status|

**A.2 API Endpoints**

Table 2.1 Table Authentication Endpoints

|POST /api/login|Authenticates user credentials and issues JWT token|
| :- | :- |
|POST /api/logout|Invalidates current user session|
|GET /api/user-info|Retrieves current user information and permissions|

Table 2.2 Request Management Endpoints

|GET /api/requests|Lists all requests visible to the current user|
| :- | :- |
|GET /api/requests/:id|Retrieves detailed information for a specific request|
|POST /api/requests|Creates a new localization request|
|PUT /api/requests/:id|Updates an existing request|
|DELETE /api/requests/:id|Deletes a request (if permitted)|

Table 2.3 Project Management Endpoints

|GET /api/projects|Lists all projects visible to the current user|
| :- | :- |
|GET /api/projects/:id|Retrieves detailed information for a specific project|
|POST /api/projects|Creates a new project from a request|
|PUT /api/projects/:id|Updates project details and status|
|DELETE /api/projects/:id|Deletes a project (if permitted)|
|GET /api/project-task-assignments/:project\_id|Retrieves all task assignments for a project|
|POST /api/project-task-assignments/:project\_id|Updates task assignments for a project|

Table 2.4 File Management Endpoints

|GET /api/files/project/:project\_id|Lists all files for a specific project|
| :- | :- |
|POST /api/files/upload|Uploads new files|
|GET /api/files/download/:file\_id|Downloads a specific file|
|POST /api/files/batch-download|Downloads multiple files as a zip archive|
|PUT /api/files/:file\_id|Updates file metadata|
|DELETE /api/files/:file\_id|Deletes a specific file|
|DELETE /api/files/group/:group\_id|Deletes a group of related files|

Table 2.5 Financial Management Endpoints

|GET /api/quotes/project/:project\_id|Retrieves all quotes for a specific project|
| :- | :- |
|POST /api/quotes|Submits a new quote|
|PUT /api/quotes/:quote\_id|Updates an existing quote|
|GET /api/quotes/export|Exports quote data to Excel format|

Table 2.6 Email Communication Endpoints

|POST /api/email/send|Sends an email to specified recipients|
| :- | :- |
|POST /api/email/preview|Generates a preview of an email without sending it|
|POST /api/email/parse-quote|Extracts quote information from email content|
